text: "Siempre Hace Frio" () is a song by American singer Selena. It was the lead single from Siempre Selena (1996). It was released after Selena's murder. A music video was released, starring Jennifer Lopez as "Selena". She later had the role as Selena in the 1997 movie about Selena's life. == Charts == Chart (1996) Peak position U.S. Billboard Hot Latin Tracks 2 U.S. Billboard Latin Regional Mexican Airplay 2 Category:Selena songs Category:1996 songs Category:Songs in Spanish
